column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ozai says : " And how was it Great - Grandfather Sozin managed to win the Battle of Han Tui ? "
#Text=Young Zuko says : " Great - Grandfather won ... because ... " Young Azula says : " Because even though his army was outnumbered , he cleverly calculated his advantages .
#Text=Now , would you show Grandfather the new moves you demonstrated to me ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " She 's a true prodigy !
#Text=Just like her grandfather for whom she 's named .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " You 'll never catch up ... " Young Zuko says : " I 'd like to demonstrate what I 've been learning .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " I failed .
#Text=" Ursa says : " No .
#Text=I loved watching you .
#Text=That 's who you are , Zuko .
#Text=Someone who keeps fighting even though it 's hard .
#Text=" Azulon says : " Prince Ozai , why are you wasting my time with this pomp ?
#Text=Just tell me what you want .
#Text=Everyone else , go !
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " What are you - ?
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Shh !
#Text=" Ozai says : " Father , you must have realized as I have , that with Lu Ten gone , Iroh 's bloodline has ended .
#Text=After his son 's death , my brother abandoned the siege at Ba Sing Se , and who knows when he will return home .
#Text=But I am here , Father , and my children are alive .
#Text=" Azulon says : " Say what it is you want !
#Text=" Ozai says : " Father , revoke Iroh 's birthright .
#Text=I am your humble servant , here to serve you and our nation .
#Text=Use me .
#Text=" Azulon says : " You dare suggest I betray Iroh ?
#Text=My first born ?
#Text=Directly after the demise of his only beloved son ?
#Text=I think Iroh has suffered enough !
#Text=But you ... your punishment has scarcely begun !
#Text="
